channel.title: Fire Godsword
channel.description: It looks a lot better in RS2. :| [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/255o1ao.png[/img]

item.title: Fire Godsword
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:13, topic:332491”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=428923.msg3149030#msg3149030 date=1268359892]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=428923.msg3149029#msg3149029 date=1268359865]
It makes me want to shout “FWAAAA!”

I like it. Its shiny.
[/quote]Thanks

I don’t like the colors, and i can hardly call it a godsword, its more of a 2 handed sword.
As i’m pretty sure there is no “fire” god.

The design of it is rather blocky, and just all out plain.

Its a nice try though.
[/quote]Yea, there is. Read a greek mythology book, but yea I don’t like the render but it looks sweet in game. I would take a picture but my computer is failing ATM.

i think this would be more like a hades godsword except make it a bit darker?[/quote]Yea it’s darker ingame, just not Hades dark.

Read full topic

[/quote]Thanks

I don’t like the colors, and i can hardly call it a godsword, its more of a 2 handed sword.
As i’m pretty sure there is no “fire” god.

The design of it is rather blocky, and just all out plain.

Its a nice try though.
[/quote]Yea, there is. Read a greek mythology book, but yea I don’t like the render but it looks sweet in game. I would take a picture but my computer is failing ATM.[/quote]

i think this would be more like a hades godsword except make it a bit darker?
